description:
An ergonomic bottle for high-flow hydration, and has a magnetic top that stows easily in the cap. The spout is angled and contoured to reach maximum guzzling efficiency.

  • Tritan™ Renew co-polyester bottle is made with 50% recycled content
  • Magnetic handle keeps the cap out of the way while drinking
  • Angled spout is easy to drink from
  • Loop handle is designed for carrying with two fingers
  • Internal cap threads make bottle smooth and comfortable to drink from
  • Wide mouth opening fits ice cubes and is easy to clean
  • Top rack dishwasher safe
name: CamelBak Chute Mag 750ml Bottle
